data.Name: Anomalie
data.Bio: There are two artists that go by Anomalie: 1) An Austrian Atmospheric Black Metal band started in 2011. https://anomalie-official.bandcamp.com/music 2) A classically trained and highly versatile keyboardist and producer based in the beautiful city of Montreal. He makes music infused with a combination of classical music, jazz, hip hop, funk, fusion and various electronic elements - sounds hectic but Anomalie pulls it off seamlessly as evidenced on his Lowtemp debut single Odyss√©e. Read more on Last.fm
